description: One day in the early morning while setting up to take a snapshot of the sunrise, Morimiya Yorito meets a strange girl at a vending machine; after talking to her for a few minutes she suddenly disappears within an instant. On the next day Yorito runs into the same girl; this time he finds out her name is Shihou Matsuri. Later on, Yorito figures out Matsuri lives in a church and goes to find her, only to see the girl being hunted by a mysterious man with a huge sword.
